name: Iron Body: Fang Flash

trigger.text: Up to 1 of your Leader or Characters gains +2000 power during this turn.

text: Main If you have 10 or more cards in your trash, give up to 1 of your Characters +2000 power until the end of your opponent's turn.

effect.text: If you have 10 or more cards in your trash, give up to 1 of your Characters +2000 power until the end of your opponent's turn.
Up to 1 of your Leader or Characters gains +2000 power during this turn.

meta.notes: Card marked as 'SAMPLE' and 'BANZA MADE IN JAPAN' on the image, but these are not part of the card's official data.
